articles.title: Kansas county to offer skills program for juvenile offenders
articles.description: TOPEKA, Kan. (AP) — A county corrections department in northeast Kansas plans to offer a skills program for juvenile offenders to help them find employment upon release. Shawnee County Commissioners voted unanimously Thursday to approve a contract between the…

articles.title: Lawsuit alleges Shawnee County holding immigrant too long
articles.description: TOPEKA, Kan. (AP) — A Topeka attorney has filed a lawsuit alleging Shawnee County is violating the rights of an inmate being kept in custody on an immigration detainer. David Alegria contends the county has held Elidio Perez-Ramirez longer than allowed by law…

articles.title: Man fatally shot by Topeka police had served time in prison
articles.description: TOPEKA, Kan. (AP) — A black man fatally shot by two police officers in Kansas' capital city was less than five months out of prison after being prosecuted on felony burglary and illegal gun possession charges, state records show.
